actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, Ways and Means, Energy and Commerce, Transportation and Infrastructure, Oversight and Government Reform, and Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: To establish a national task force to expand opportunities and improve the standard of living for working families in America.
short_title: Working Families Task Force Act of 2025

titles.title: Working Families Task Force Act of 2025
Working Families Task Force Act of 2025
To establish a national task force to expand opportunities and improve the standard of living for working families in America.
